title: UX/UI audit: Apple HIG compliance and usability fixes
description: UX/UI audit against Apple HIG and Spotlight conventions. See docs/ux-audit.md for full findings and 20 prioritized recommendations covering: light mode readability, layout stability, search interaction (auto-select, escape, keyboard nav), results information density, detail view code readability, database picker race condition, and app identity/iconography.

title: Improve syntax highlighting contrast in light mode
description: R1.2+R1.3+R8.3: Add colorScheme awareness to SyntaxHighlighter. Use darker variants for light mode (especially orange/teal tokens). Fix comment priority bug (keywords inside comments get keyword color). Increase collection badge contrast. See docs/ux-audit.md R1.2, R1.3, R8.3.

title: Detail view: widen panel and improve code readability
description: R5.1+R5.2+R5.3: Widen panel from 400 to 500-550pt. Reduce code font to 11pt in detail (keep 13pt for prose). Add horizontal scroll for code. See docs/ux-audit.md section 5.

title: Add accessibility labels and keyboard support
description: R8.1+R8.2: Add accessibilityLabel to status badge, search field, result rows, action buttons. Ensure color is never sole indicator of state. See docs/ux-audit.md section 8.

title: Simplify result rows: remove syntax highlighting, reduce info
description: R4.1+R4.2: Remove syntax highlighting from list rows (unreadable at 11pt/400pt). Show plain text preview with match terms bolded. Remove collection badge from rows (show in detail only). Reduce to: icon + name + page + 1-2 line plain preview. See docs/ux-audit.md section 4.

title: Switch databases from menu bar
description: Add a database picker to the menu bar app. Show the list of available databases (from ~/.quarry/data/ directory listing or a status API) and let the user switch between them. Switching should restart the daemon with the selected database name and reinitialize the search client.
close_reason: PR #3 merged: database switcher with async discovery, picker UI, and switching workflow

title: Register folders for sync from menu bar
Fixed-origin layout: eliminate vertical centering shifts
description: R2.1+R2.3: All search states (idle, loading, empty, error) should anchor content to top of content area. Replace Spacer/Spacer centering and ContentUnavailableView with top-aligned layouts. Add subtle transition animation. See docs/ux-audit.md section 2.

title: Search field: auto-select text, escape key, remove x button
description: R3.1+R3.2+R3.3: Adopt Spotlight interaction model. Auto-select text on panel open via NSViewRepresentable wrapping NSTextField with selectText(nil). Handle Escape key (back from detail, then dismiss). Remove x clear button (auto-select makes it unnecessary). See docs/ux-audit.md sections 3.

title: Fix status badge readability in light mode
description: R1.1: Don't rely on color alone for status. Keep colored icon but use .primary for text label. Consider increasing font from .caption to .footnote. See docs/ux-audit.md R1.1.

title: Menu bar icon: differentiate states
description: R7.2: Use different SF Symbol variants for stopped (outline) vs running (filled). Add subtle animation for starting state. See docs/ux-audit.md R7.2.

title: Design and set custom app icon
description: R7.1: Design a macOS app icon evoking quarry (mining) + search. Follow Apple icon design guidelines: rounded rect, 1024x1024 master, no transparency. Currently all AppIcon slots are empty. See docs/ux-audit.md R7.1.

title: Keyboard navigation for results list
description: R3.4: Add List(selection:) binding with arrow key support. Enable Up/Down navigation, Enter to select, visual highlight of focused row. Standard macOS List behavior. See docs/ux-audit.md R3.4.
close_reason: PR #10 merged: keyboard navigation with List(selection:) binding

title: Database picker: fix race condition and add timeout
description: R6.1+R6.2+R6.3: Add reentrancy guard with defer { isDiscovering = false }. Add subprocess timeout (5s). Show timeout message instead of permanent Loading. See docs/ux-audit.md section 6.
